name: bella 4Qt Slim Air Fryer, Fits-anywhere™ Kitchenware, EverGood™ Ceramic Nonstick Coating, Adjustable Temperature, 6 Preset Cooking Options, 60 Min Auto Shutoff w Audible Tone, 3.3lb Capacity, Oatmilk
short_description: Slim Design for Any Space: The bella 4qt Air Fryer features a sleek, space-saving design, perfect for fitting into any kitchen while providing enough room for big batches of your favorite foods. Save up to 50% more space compared to prior models

EverGood Ceramic Nonstick Coating: Our proprietary coating ensures easy cleanup without PFAS, PFOA, PTFE, lead, or cadmium. Enjoy healthier cooking and hassle-free maintenance, making every meal prep a breeze

XL Basket Capacity: The innovative XL basket of the air fryers holds up to 3.3 lbs of food, perfect for family meals. Cook up large batches of fries, chicken, salmon, and more, all at once, making mealtime faster and more efficient

Digital Controls: With adjustable temperature and 6 presets - air fry, bake, roast, broil, reheat, dehydrate - preparing quick and tasty meals has never been easier. Enjoy crispy food fast with 1300 watts of power and circular heat technology

Modern, Subtle Fluting: Designed with stylish rounded corners, a soft matte finish, and subtle fluting, our premium quality, small kitchen appliances add a touch of modern elegance to any home, enhancing both functionality and aesthetics
product_description: Experience the ultimate in kitchen convenience with the bella 4qt Air Fryer, designed to transform your cooking routine. Its tall, slim profile maximizes vertical space, saving valuable cabinet and counter room, while the redesigned 4 QT basket offers a generous 3.3 lb food capacity, perfect for feeding a family of four, all within a smaller footprint. Safety and convenience go hand in hand with this compact air fryer. The cool-touch handle and durable construction provide confidence and comfort during use, while the 60-minute auto shut-off timer with an audible tone prevents overcooking. Keep your kitchen tidy with the cord wrap feature, perfect for easy storage Cleaning up has never been easier thanks to the EverGood Ceramic Nonstick Coating, which ensures rapid food release and easy wipe-down cleaning. Both the basket and crisping tray are dishwasher safe, making post-meal cleanup quick and convenient. bella air fryer is available in four exclusive colors—Oatmilk, Surf, Plum, and Blossom—designed to complement any kitchen decor and style. Combining innovative design, safety, and superior performance, our small appliances are an indispensable addition to any home.

product_description: COSORI TurboBlaze 6.0-Quart Air Fryer Open the Envelope Inside the Package – Get a Complete Recipe Book & Detailed Manual to Start Your Culinary Journey! Upgrade your kitchen appliance and experience the convenience of faster, more versatile cooking with our revolutionary Air Fryer. Perfect for families with kids, fitness enthusiasts, and seniors with heart concerns, our air fryer helps you prepare a variety of delicious, healthy meals effortlessly. Ensure every bite is packed with flavor and nutrients, making healthier cooking effortless for everyone. TurboBlaze Technology: This innovative 5-speed airflow system ensures your food is evenly cooked, delivering perfectly crispy and tender results every time in just minutes. Meanwhile, the cutting-edge design of the motor includes a soft start feature, making the operating noise quieter. Experience the revolutionary technology that change everyone's cooking life. Specifications: Model: CAF-DC601-KUS Power Supply: DC 120V, 60Hz Rated Power: 1,725W Capacity: 6 qt /5.7 L (serves everyone) Temperature Range: 90°-450°F/ 30°-230°C Time Range: 1 min-24 hr Product Dimensions (including handle): 14.37''D x 11.81''W x 11.85''H ( Leave 13 cm / 5 inches of space behind and above the air fryer. Leave enough room to open the door ) Product Dimensions (not including handle): 11.81''D x 11.81'' W x 11.85''H Basket Usable Space with Crisper Plate: 9.31''D x 9.31'' W x 3.48''H (20 pcs of chicken wings) Basket Usable Space without Crisper Plate: 9.31''D x 9.31'' W x 4.49''H Weight: 13.2 lb /6 kg Replacement Accessories: COSORI Turboblaze Replacement Basket CRP-DC601RB-KUS #B0D1B865ZB COSORI Turboblaze Replacement Crisper Tray CRP-DC601RC-KUS #B0D1CCJ5QN Note: 1.Customizable Preheat Program: Enjoy flexibility with our preheat program, which adjusts time based on temperature. Easily choose whether to preheat for optimal results, or skip it as the default setting for a hassle-free experience. 2.Test Run: In order to make sure the air fryer is working correctly and remove potential odors from the manufacturing process, please follow the instructions in the manual for the Test Run before cooking with your air fryer. 3. Automatically Resume Cooking: If you pull out the basket, the air fryer will pause cooking automatically. The display will turn off temporarily as a safety feature. When you return the basket, the air fryer will automatically resume cooking based on your previous settings. 4. Don't Miss Out Envelope: Kindly remember to check the envelope in the box for your recipe book and user manual. Tips: For easy cleanup during cooking, consider using air fryer paper liners to catch food residue that may fall from the crisp plate. These liners are designed to collect any food debris, making cleanup a breeze. READ CAUTION 1. Do not touch the hot basket when air fryer is running. 2. Do not fill with oil. This is not a deep fryer. 3. Do not turn the basket over because the hot crisper plate may fall out. Note: Firmly insert the crisper plate into the basket to reduce the chance of it falling out. 4. Do not use Turbo Mode cooking functions for thin, lightweight food. Air circulation may cause food to lift and touch the heating coils.

short_description: FRY UP YOUR FAVORITES: Enjoy faster, healthier cooking for popular deep fryer foods like French fries, corn dogs, chicken wings, Brussels sprouts, and more! This stainless steel air fryer produces extra-crispy meals with a fraction of the calories compared to oily, messy deep fryers.

FOUR-IN-ONE COOKING: This touchscreen air fryer features four functions, including Air Fry, Bake, and Reheat. Our new Frozen function defrosts and then crisps for an added crunch on fries or mozzarella sticks.
INTUITIVE CONTROLS: Set up your cooking with the easy-to-use touch control UI. TurboFry air fryers let you program your perfect cooking time and temperature up to an impressive 400°F.
BRING THE HEAT: The Chefman air fryer cranks up the temperature to 450°F for the final two minutes of cooking. Our HI-FRY button puts a beautiful golden-brown crisp on air fried potatoes and chicken.
SHAKE NOTIFICATIONS: Get automatic alerts halfway through cooking to shake the air fryer basket, guaranteeing evenly crisped French fries without having to set an extra timer.
MINIMIZED FOOTPRINT: The newly designed frame for our XL airfryers cuts down on exterior size while maximizing your basket capacity. Fit even more food without losing any additional counterspace!
EASY TO CLEAN: The nonstick 8-quart basket is top-rack dishwasher safe to make cleaning easy. Plus, the stainless-steel finish stays sleek and shining after days of frequent use.

name: Ninja | Indoor Grill and Air Fryer| Foodi Smart XL | 6-in-1 Grill, Air Fry, Roast, Bake, Broil, Dehydrate & Crisp |Smart Thermometer & Splatter Shield | Dishwasher Safe Parts | Black/Silver | FG551
short_description: SMART INDOOR GRILL & AIR FRYER COMBO: The Ninja Foodi Smart XL Grill is an all-in-one indoor electric grill and air fryer oven that sears, sizzles, and crisps. Ideal for countertop use, it combines grilling and air frying with Ninja’s Smart Cook System and dual-sensor thermometer for perfect results every time

CYCLONIC GRILLING TECHNOLOGY: Enjoy authentic BBQ grill flavor indoors with 500°F cyclonic air that char-grills food evenly on the grill grate. Get delicious sear marks with no need for outdoor grills or smokers. Perfect for apartments or indoor smokeless grill cooking.

SMART COOK SYSTEM WITH THERMOMETER: The Foodi Smart Thermometer uses 4 protein presets and 9 doneness levels to take the guesswork out of cooking. Whether it’s rare steak or well-done chicken, get it right every time — no more undercooked meals or overcooking.

XL CAPACITY FAMILY SIZED CAPACITY: The grill grate fits up to 6 steaks or 24 hot dogs — cook mains and sides all at once. Ideal for large air fryer needs, meal prepping, or family dinners. Also fits well into outdoor kitchen alternatives and tailgating.

6-IN-1 VERSATILITY: More than just a grill! This Ninja air fryer also air crisps, roasts, bakes, broils, and dehydrates. From juicy burgers to crispy wings, it replaces multiple appliances. A must-have for fans of air fryer ovens and multi-cookers.

HEALTHIER FRIED FAVORITES: Achieve that crispy fried texture with up to 75% less fat than traditional frying (tested against hand-cut, deep-fried French fries) using the 4 qt air fryer crisper basket. A great choice for health-conscious cooks.

SMOKE CONTROL SYSTEM: Enjoy grilling without the smoke. A splatter shield, cool-air zone, and temperature-controlled grill grate work together to keep smoke to a minimum — perfect for smokeless indoor grilling and keeping your kitchen clean.
WHAT’S INCLUDED: Ninja Smart XL Grill, 9" x 12" Grill Grate, 4 qt. Crisper Basket, 4 qt. Cooking Pot, Foodi Smart Thermometer, Cleaning Brush and Chef Created 15 Recipe Book.
